Package org.threadly.test.concurrent

Tools used for unit testing concurrent software.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncVerifier
    A simple class for verifying multi-threaded unit tests.
    TestablePriorityScheduler Deprecated
    Use TestableScheduler now that it also implements PrioritySchedulerInterface
    TestableScheduler
    This differs from NoThreadScheduler in that time is ONLY advanced via the tick calls.
    TestCondition
    TestCondition in unit test, designed to check a condition for something that is happening in a different thread.
    TestRunnable
    Generic runnable implementation that can be used in unit tests for verifying execution occurred.
    TestUtils
    Generic tools to be used in unit testing.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TestCondition.ConditionTimeoutException
    Thrown if condition is still false after a given timeout.

Package org.threadly.test.concurrent Description

Tools used for unit testing concurrent software. These tools range from thread pools which control execution flow, to reusable structures which are common when testing concurrent code, to utilities for controlling the unit test code flow.
